channel.title: [Repp ++] SoulSplit Run Errors
channel.description:
when ever a player or i use soulsplit it says this in the cmd
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/23rjtr5.jpg[/img]
and this is the line
[code] public void execute(EventContainer b) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].gfx0(2264); // 1738 c.SSPLIT = false; b.stop();[/code]
How do i change? do i just put the false to true?
